venue.name: American Bistro in the Cambridge Marriott

item.description:
***PLEASE ANSWER POLLS***

Your input will help us come to consensus on a few items - see Message Board for Meeting Agenda & Format. Thanks.


What's an interesting issue we'll discuss? We will discuss our vision and goals for meetup. We will discuss how we want to help each other get better and reach our goals.

Who should come? Are newcomers welcome? Organizers and assistant organizers are welcome

Why should people come? To network, learn, grow and meet new organizers.

Do attendees need to participate or can they just listen? you can just listen.

How will members find you when they get there? I will be wearing a name badge and at the front of the venue.
item.name: Boston Meetup Organizer October 2006 Meetup
